maya's religious beliefs are personal and not overtly practiced, preferring a-private, individual approach to faith. she seldom attends religious services but respects the beliefs of others and values the role of spirituality in personal growth.

in her leisure time, maya enjoys reading, gardening, and exploring local art galleries. she is an almost constant user of the internet, staying updated on news, connecting with friends on social media, and sometimes participating in online forums discussing social and political issues.

given her background and life experiences, maya's economic concerns revolve around affordable healthcare, education, and job security. she advocates for policies that address income inequality and ensures access to quality education for all, believing these are key to creating a more inclusive society. maya is registered to vote and exercises her right religiously, believing it is a fundamental way to influence change and hold leaders accountable.
